title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: My piple , I say make we chuck mouth for this matter before I go carry am go public. E be look the world system, e be like say wickedness pass good wey we dey do ourselves oooo. Make we think am well. Why I bring this matter be say, if bitcoins go make life comfortable, make people their own bank , why government wey dey act like say them care for their citizen go dey fight am. This one na pure wickedness and e show say selfishness and corruption dey for the whole world.  If the government in every country believe in freedom, why dem go like hold people hostage in terms of financial freedom. This matter no clear at all.  Make person no talk say them no understand the system bcos na high tech people dey work with bank and dey know pass that one. This one na the highest level of wickedness wey dey happen for many country. Even if some country don dey allow people use bitcoins now, but e no dey always clear on their next move.If Dem leave people with their choice of payment system go better pass all their restrictions. Person wey like fiat go go with that one. Since Dem even see say their restrictions dey recieve criticism from deir own people, most of this people suppose reverse their decision. I know say Bitcoin na volatile asset but that one no means say make people no fit decide waiting Dem like do.  Even d fiat, no be everyday e dey loose in value?. Wetin you think, wetin be your own idea, no man is an island of knowledge, make we reason as you see this matter for your side.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.created_time: May 04, 2024, 06:56:42 AMLast edit: May 04, 2024, 11:54:42 AM by DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Quote from: Smartvirus on September 29, 2023, 11:39:46 PMWhile we dey look up to the selfish reasons and why I like the idea about decentralization and financial freedom, we go always give the idea space to develop in the heart of our government.Yes, nice point there because government controls the country and you really cannot implement anything involving its citizens without its approval. I can't help bug think though, can the government ever give total support to a scheme it cannot control or influence?, I think no. As soon as the government perceived that they're being held in the dark concerning its operations, they look for legal or illegal ways to bring that  scheme down, look at what's happened to Samurai wallets. They seized their website, arrested their mixers developers and even went as far as using seizure request to google play for their mobile app simply because they observed unlawful funds transfers and money laundering through them.Truth be told, such crimes have been existing in conventional banks, wired funds platforms and other financial institutions, they neither seized the platforms nor arrested the developers, they only arrested the perpetrators of the crime and brought them to justice.taking a look at this story for example https://e.vnexpress.net/news/news/crime/nigerian-arrested-in-hcmc-for-laundering-foreign-criminal-money-4739755.html the funds that were trafficked here were transferred multiple times before withdrawal, but we never heard that the government seized the platforms or banks, neither did they disclose them nor arrest anybody apart from the criminals.These are direct attacks on cryptocurrency and not just fight for justice, government can fight justice without attacking crypto organization physically and knowing they cannot control the decentralized monetary system makes them more combat ready and brutal when dealing with any crypto related shortcomings. The wait for government to adapt to crypto and its privacy inclination is valid, but for me, it seems eternal. We need more smart moves to convince them cos they're not loosening their grip anytime soon.
